resources.string: Long strings of characters will be predicted with spaces inserted.
Predictions won\'t be guessed if spaces are missed
Currently words that start sentences will be automatically capitalized
Currently words that start sentences won\'t be automatically capitalized
Words with a \'+\' sign beside them will be learned when tapped.
Words with a \'+\' sign beside them will require a tap and hold to be learned.
Currently iKnowU will be showing corrections in the prediction bar.
Currently iKnowU will not be showing corrections in the prediction bar.
Currently auto-correct will automatically insert a correction for you.
Currently you will have to insert a correction manually.
Currently a period will be added if there are two consecutive spaces.
Currently two consecutive spaces will just be two spaces.
Set the intensity of key press vibration
Set the intensity of key press sound
Currently, the next most likely keys you will press, will be highlighted in color
Currently, the next most likely keys you will press, will not be highlighted in color
Currently, when a correction is made the keyboard will flash, make a sound, and vibrate
Currently, when a correction is made, there will be no feedback from the keyboard
Tell iKnowU what you think, we\'d love to hear your input
By enabling cloud services you will be able to sync your dictionaries across all your devices, meaning that new words learned here, will show up on your other devices
You are syncing dictionaries across all your devices
You are not syncing dictionaries across all your devices
The font size for the displayed predictions
Set the height of the keys on the keyboard
Change the look of the keyboard font
Select your preferred keyboard layout to use when typing
Set the preferred layout to use when typing on a tablet
Determines how long you must hold down before a press becomes a long press
Determines how long you must hold down before deleting the next word
Set the theme for your keyboard
You are currently in right handed mode
You are currently in left handed mode
Phrase predictions will be shown, making the keyboard taller
Phrase predictions will not be shown, making the keyboard shorter
Thanks for choosing iKnowU Keyboard! We\'d love to hear you\'re feedback, why not leave us a review and tell us what you think?
Thanks for trying iKnowU Keyboard! Purchase the full version to maintain full functionality.
Updates are available for your dictionaries
Tap check boxes to enable/disable dictionaries.\nDrag and drop boxes to set priority.\nTop of the list means higher priority.
Type a word in the box and tap the \'+\' to add a word.
Tap the \'x\' to delete a word.
Build a personalized dictionary for better predictions and corrections by letting us learn from your social feeds.
Success! Would you like to set your new dictionary as your main language?
Once you have enabled iKnowU Keyboard, be sure to hit the back button to continue the setup process
There was an error loading a file. Please make sure that your device is not connected to a computer.
Thanks for choosing the iKnowU Keyboard!
iKnowU Keyboard is not the default keyboard, would you like to set it now?
Thanks for choosing iKnowU Keyboard! Before you get started, we have a few tips to help you start using your keyboard to its full potential! \n\nPress next to continue.
With iKnowU Reach, you can \"reach\" into other apps for quick access to useful information.
Swipe down on the keyboard to switch to the menu screen and then swipe up to return to the keyboard screen.
By tapping on a word in the prediction bar, the word will be inserted with a space following it. Tap and hold on a word with a \'…\' to insert a word without a space and see additional endings.
To access extra characters located on each key, simply press and hold on the desired key, then slide to a character and let go.
Choose from one of our many included themes to stylize your typing experience!
You can easily change the layout of your keyboard by pressing and holding on the 123 key on the bottom left.
From there, while still holding down, you can select one of the available options.
iKnowU supports multiple languages at once!

Auto-corrections will show up in the prediction bar above your keyboard. To use an auto-correction you can simply tap on it from the prediction bar, or better yet, just press space! The word in bold will be the one that gets inserted. If auto-correct has inserted something that you don\'t want, you can simply \'re-correct\' back to what you typed previously by selecting the green word from the prediction bar. If the green word has a \'+\' sign beside it, you can tap and hold to \'re-correct\' this word AND add it to your personal dictionary.
We\'ve also added in the capability to erase your previous word more easily, all you have to do is make a swiping action with your finger from right to left!

iKnowU keyboard lets you create words and phrases with a single touch of the keyboard.

 All you have to do is type a letter, then press and hold on the space bar!

 To select a word, just slide your finger up to the desired word and let go.

 Also, some words may have a '…' behind them, by holding your finger on one of these, you will select it and bring up a new set of predictions!

iKnowU keyboard is always keeping track of what you are typing.

 The bar above the keyboard will constantly be predicting your next words and phrases!

 To select a word, it's as easy as tapping on it.

 Also, if a word in the bar has a '…' behind it, just press and hold on it to get more predictions.

iKnowU keyboard will show you what keys you are most likely going to press next.

 Blue keys mean that there are more than five predictions after that letter.

 Green keys mean that there are five or less predictions after that letter.

 Either way, scanning for your next key becomes a lot less irritating with letter predictions!
Each key can generate multiple different characters.\n\n To pick a different character just press and hold on the key containing it, slide your finger over to your desired character, and let go."
